Query.SqlString: SELECT Top 32767 ID,Literature FROM Literature WHERE (Literature ='MCGR86')

BibliographicData.Title: Afferent and efferent projections of the inferior area 6 in the macaque monkey

TracerSubstance.FullName: Horseradish peroxidase, conjugated to wheat germ agglutinin

Reference.Quotation: "...in monkey IT4-1, in which the area 4 mouth field was injected..."
"...in monkey IT4-3, in which the area 4 hand field was injected..."
"...injecting WGA-HRP in the leg representation of area 4 (monkey IT4-5)."
"The left hemisphere injection was in the cytochrome oxidase area F1; the right hemisphere injection was in area F4."
"The left hemisphere injection was in the cytochrome oxidase area F1; the right hemisphere injection was in area F4."
"...an injection in the postarcuate cortex in its lateral part is entirely in F5 [IT6-4], while an injection near the spur [IT6-3] invades both F4 and F5."
"...an injection in the postarcuate cortex in its lateral part is entirely in F5 [IT6-4], while an injection near the spur [IT6-3] invades both F4 and F5."
